summary: Provides utilities to convert Anthropic chat request and response structures to and from the format required by Vertex AI partner models, handling configuration, error translation, tool usage, streaming responses, and usage statistics.
business_intent: Facilitates seamless integration of Anthropic models within the Vertex AI ecosystem, allowing developers to interact with Anthropic chat capabilities through Vertex AI APIs while ensuring proper request/response mapping, error handling, streaming support, and usage tracking.
